entries.entry: She and her like have red-rocky shells to protect their softnesses. Inside is very sweet! Very hard to crack them open though, so is best to wait. Is always best to wait!

entry.name: MAPPER_SPAR_ACCEPT
entry.hpage: Gladly, Shakra. Upon this stone, let us test our shells.

entries.entry: Well met, sister. Though the beastly Citadel has finally been slain, still the lands caught beneath it suffer!The evils long done by that cursed place have sunk into the kingdom’s very foundations, and now they rise up as a black sickness.This darkness, it is a curse deadlier than the Haunting... a force from far below that will consume all if given the opportunity.Hmm... Just so! And while wickedness still stalks these lands, our hornlance shall not rest!

Sturdy gaaaaa-aaate, I don’t ask you break or beee-eeend,
Just open a little for me, and my tall maiden frieeee-eeend!
These waters, at land’s edge... and the shrine atop... our furtive escape... our brief retreat from rule...So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
What say you, sister? Shall we join together in valiant combat?

Oh red maiden, sorry to have lured you into such danger!And those poor bugs, bewitched by the thread. No sin could possibly warrant such a fate...Your pity is not misplaced, but better suited for another time. For now, you should look to your own care.Ah... yes. I should get these healing supplies back to the pilgrims’ settlement above. My brothers and sisters have waited long enough.

entry.name: LACE_ABYSS_LAKE_DIVE_CURSED
entry.hpage: The parasite writhing within my shell has a violent aversion to the void. Despite the protection granted by the Everbloom, even now I can feel those wretched roots preventing my descent.If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.

entries.entry: Many foes await us. Shall we duel with one another before moving on?

entry.name: HUNTER_FAN_SKULLKING_MEET
entry.hpage: Greetings, Nuu. You have travelled far from your lodgings, I was not expecting to meet you in these lowlands.Oh, hello again miss grown-up! Yes, Nuu is not the fastest, but she goes great distances to follow the scent of learnings.And look what Nuu has found! A great big beast, cracked open and broken apart! There is much to learn from him, so Nuu will savour it all slowly.

entries.entry: With this quill, you can add any new areas you discover to the maps that you own. We pluck these quills from Golpeni hunted by my tribe. Their hollowed shafts make the perfect charting tool.

Child Wielding Needle, how far our wanderings take us! The cold air here bites through our shells as true as any blade. Warm yourself by my lantern while I call. Pharloom is a land of harsh extremes. Perhaps that is, in part, why the pilgrims have a culture of testing themselves against it so fervently.Perhaps. When I first encountered them, I had little respect for the weak, rag-bundled bugs. Too cowardly to even carry a weapon!But... Dondakku. Sometimes we judge too quickly. There is a subtle strength to them, though it is difficult for me to truly understand it.

Ahh, the caress of this warm water on my weary limbs is welcome indeed. As soothing as a psalm, haha!Will you splishy-splash in the holy bath with me, red maiden? We can sing together to aid in our rejuvenation!
Want yer clicky-clackies threaded nice and tight? Old Grindle will do it gladly, if you let ‘im snitch a few for hisself...

D-do not judge me a doubter! The Citadel is a holy place indeed, resplendent and vast beyond my wildest hopes!But yet... the grand halls ache with silence, and I see suffering in the shadows wherever I peer too deeply.Fear, and pain... why were these things allowed into our paradise? Have my brothers and sisters not yet earned their holy reward?

...Crossed weapons, sleeping of course, but shaped unlike any you’ve seen before......To travel underneath is one thing, but travelling up above may require a different sort of sight...Sir Herald... It seems rare coincidence for us to meet in this distant land. Unless, perhaps, you followed me here?...A path that meets itself is an ill portent indeed. Those who peer sideways know well enough...
Nice little pair of rolly-rollies we got ‘ere. Sure to bring luck to any snitchin’ expedition...

...The elements do not conspire against you. They have their own desires......When one spies a great peak, the natural inclination is to begin climbing......The little left-behind... you’ve decided, then? A companion for the journey...

entry.name: GREEN_PRINCE_VERDANIA_BOSS_2
entry.hpage: Feel guilt at your absence, sir, but know the end was inexorable, the outcome set, whether you remained or not.Do not seek to console me, warrior... This memory is mine alone... I’ll not brook your brutish intrusion...You who dare trespass this sacred chamber, ready yourself... to see us, and know us, Verdania’s rulers, together in our finest form...

entries.entry: If you choose to rest here, I will watch over you, Child Wielding Needle. These charts require long attention, and my own sleep is far off yet.

Beasty, beastly, big fat beast! Strong as a boulder, or a rock at least! Let’s sing together ‘til you’re released!Oh! Look here red maiden, this poor creature is all tangled up in white bindings! Surely you know a song for unsticking such stickiness?It will take a power greater than song to break these bindings, little one. In my current diminished state even I can not cut through them.Well, worry not! If something is needed, the road will bring it to us!
Bellway Pins

Nimble bug! You abandoned the race? Surely it was only an error?In the pursuit of speed all reason can ofttimes be lost, left in the wind as it were.At least you seem recovered of your lapse. And surely you are eager now?We must sprint on! Let us soar swift together!
Bench Pins

Child Wielding Needle. These are stale roads, ill-fitted for warriors such as ourselves.There is fair combat here against the roach-beasts and their keepers, but the air is sickly and the water writhes with parasites.This environment is harsh indeed, though life seems to adapt itself to many hardships. Do you believe your master travelled these roads?I had thought not at first, but upon closer search I found the fragments of a trail winding through these fetid ruins.Perhaps she saw something here that I did not? Her senses are often keen where mine are clouded.

Hold there, sister! A great beast stalks this land, swooping and screeching like an ill-mannered tyrant!Zaza has been following the creature’s scent, and now I’m sure we’re almost upon it! We’re so close my whiskers are bristling!Such a beast is worthy quarry for the valiant, aye? What say you, shall we hunt the creature together?

Many of Pharloom’s bugs have useful equipment and items to trade. It would do you well to keep track of their locations with this pin.
These pins will mark vendors on your map.
Basic tool’o the job, here. Throw your big needle and scratch shinies straight off your target’s shell!
Mosslands Map

...Oh. Wyrm child. No surprise it’s you who meets me here.Following me are you? Or calling me? It is true I would not have sought the lands below if not for your grand actions within them.But now, having journeyed their breadth, what singular sights I beheld... Flaming lakes, tangled woods, caves consumed by sand and frost...Remarkable things all, though given their void claimed state it seems you and I may be the last to hold those memories.I cannot allow that outcome, Herald. I act now to save that place, both for myself and for those bugs still alive within.As one who has seen so much, tell me simply, do you believe my efforts in vain?Me? Certainly you can ask, but I cannot provide good answer. I’ve no mind for outcomes. Always my vision is too clouded by the present.Only the journey... the now. For myself, that is the purpose, and as far as my sight can see.If any other could come to understand that state, Wyrm child, I suspect it may be you... Though maybe not yet, not this present, hmmm? Maybe in a future far, when your actions might hail me so again?Alas, from these quaking caves it is past time I made my swift exit. Ours each may be long and winding roads, but I hope you too come to know the many joys upon the path...
You would fight alone, sister? You would be undefeatable with me by your side! And Zaza also! You need only ask, and our hornlance would be yours.
...Do they realise it would only be the beginning? If they cleave themselves free, they would need to find their way anew...
My hopes go with you, red maiden. They will follow you into the deepest darkness, and beyond!
Fierce red-shells nest across these wide caverns. Battle with them is most intense. Impressive are the warriors of Pharloom.
Deep Docks Map

entry.name: LACE_ABYSS_LAKE_DIVE_3
entry.hpage: Even if only your shadow remains, to release your mother’s grip my blade would see it slain.Then why hold, even this moment? Surely terror hasn’t suddenly claimed your hardened heart?Take the final plunge, spider. Join us in my drowning palace, and let oblivion swallow us all.Oblivion may take you, child. My own life, I shall not sacrifice.I have survived the fury of your land. I have borne its barbs and its blades, and I have seen wonder behind its dangers.But always, child, I remain a daughter of Hallownest. And the void below all things, that darkness I will fear no longer...

entries.entry: Oooh! Greedy are you? Mean to poor li’l snitchbugs like us? Won’t survive out there without our secrets, oh no no!

Our last race was grand, yes? But I see now I set too mild a challenge for one as spritely as yourself!I prepared only to race, but you arrived bringing destiny! In you my wish may finally be granted, the barriers of speed broken wide!Are you prepared nimble bug? The time is upon us. The final test for the swift and spry!
Miss grown-up has hunted much, so soon is time for Nuu to venture out, she thinks. Keep your sights keen, for to meet in the wilds would be a delight!

O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!Are you too a prisoner here, small bug? If we ally our efforts, escape could be made that much easier.Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! Just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
A scroll detailing the scents and tastes of Pharloom’s various bugs and beasts.

Miss grown-up! Nuu had fear that the awful rumblings of the world or sticky black threads had snatched you away from her!I have survived, Nuu, and shall fight on while my strength remains.The kingdom has grown darkly dangerous, but this hearth-home seems to still provide some safety. I suggest you remain here for now.Of course! Nuu shall stay inside. The sickening sense of those twisted threads has spoilt the joy of my venturings.You though, miss grown-up... is now not the perfect time to fully complete our journal?The world-rumblings will surely have scared up many creatures from their hiding places! So go and hunt, and show sweet Nuu what you learn!

Why spurn a little duel, sister? Surely it would put us in good stead for the trials ahead!If we were to duel it would doubtless be illuminating. Unfortunately, I lack the time for such frivolity. Farewell, sirs.

entry.name: SNAILS_ACT3_MEET_PT1
entry.hpage: Cowards. Here you hide, even as you cause your own land’s demise.

entries.entry: Ka, va! Your shell is ridden with those gruesome maggots. It was a foolish choice of yours to swim in their sickly pools.This was by no means desired, Shakra. For now, I think it best you remain at limb’s length. I shall not abide this infestation long. By Silk or by rest I shall soon see myself cleansed.
Nimble bug! You seem to have lost your way upon the course. Surely it was only an error? You already seem recovered of your lapse.You are eager to run again, yes, yes? Let us soar swift together!

...One can visit the past, but then memories become contradictory......When the call rings out again, will you let your previous actions cloud your vision?...By claw, by voice... History always rises to meet us...
Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!Think of all the delectable learnings can we dig out of the creatures living here!
Blasted Steps Map
But wait! Before you depart. Your exceptional skill requires an equally fine reward!This shining shard of ancient mask is yours! Take it. Cherish it. And know, you shall forever have my thanks.
This is a fine shiny-shiny, ain’t it? Those dirty old raggedies like to carry these around, and we like to snitch ‘em away when we can! O-ho-ho!
Ooooh ma, you make Nuu so happy! Hunt down the creatures of this land, and record them in this scroll!

entry.name: MAPPER_GENERIC_CORALCAVERNS
entry.hpage: Fair greetings Shakra, in these drifts consumed by crust and sand.These caverns have returned to nature, but I see evidence of bold structures buried throughout.The shells of their builders rest in a tower above. A grand tribe they seemed, and strong fighters I’m sure. Alas, they exist now only as hardened husks.Lament, Child Wielding Needle! We lived too late to match their claws.

entries.entry:
Don’t despair, pilgrim frieeeee-eeend,
Lift your sight and raise your voice!
Have no fear, pilgrim truuuuu-uuuuue,
Believing is a happy choice!Hoy there! Aren’t these fields marvellous? And above us are the bountiful moors, where every pilgrim can fill their belly!These hot fields are a wonder indeed, but hunters prowl the long grass. Playing your instrument will only alert them to your presence.Well then, alert them I shall! For where many gather, great songs are sung!

entry.name: GRINDLE_CITADEL_ENCLAVE
entry.hpage: Some pilgrims have made an encampment in a safer place than this, high on the other side of the Citadel.They would surely allow you to stay there, if you could resist causing them mischief.An en-camp-ment, eh? Sounds like a jolly place for old Grindle! Mayhaps we’ll have a sniff around later.That’s a good tip, that. And you’ve just done given it to us for free! O-hoho, head fulla muck you got!

entries.entry: Well well! Seems I won the last of your rosaries. Luck is granted to the faithful, it is sung, so I must be very faithful indeed.If you happen on any more rosaries though, I’d be well happy to play you again.
Bronze Marker

entry.name: HUNTER_FAN_JOURNAL_GIVEN_ACT3
entry.hpage: Already, I have cut down many of this lands inhabitants, but I agree, documenting those creatures is a worthwhile undertaking.If time still permits, I shall do as you wish.Ma! How wonderful for Nuu! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!

entries.entry: Hoho, free at last! Locked up in here much too long, we was. Nasty place to keep a poor little snitchbug like Grindle.Hoy, you’re smellin’ fancy! You got some pockets under your cloak? Hidin’ away some goodies for us to pilfer?Beware your greed, thief. You’d be dead before your claw reached my cloak.O-hoho! Never mind then, bully. Plenty of tasties lying around for us down here. We smells ‘em!
Shellwood Map

entry.name: MAPPER_MASTER_AFTER
entry.hpage: Your master has been found, Shakra. Your task in these lands is finished. Will you now return to your tribe? I shall not return, Hornet Wielding Needle... I cannot. To leave my tribe’s nest-plains, that journey has only one direction. This has always been our way, our long leaving, for those few who survive till age seeks to claim their shell, and those fewer who choose to send them on.But these lands, Pharloom... My nest-plains I once saw so grand, now they become small. A place for birth, and growing, but a place too narrow to live a bug’s life full.

entries.entry: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? It is a difficult thing to explain simply... Her strength was needed, what was left, to cut Pharloom free of its black thread threat. It was a savage act, no doubt, but the reason was just.Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.

entry.name: SNAILS_ACT3_HORNET_RITUAL_CURSED
entry.page: Hold it, Old One! That intruder writhing within your shell... Our ritual ain’t gonna work while that cruel creature’s present. We’d be tugging at its memories as much as your own.Then free me of the affliction. Surely you have the skill?Not for this! Our power’s all of soul and that thing’s all physical. You’re gonna need more traditional tools of healing.Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.

entries.entry:
When travelling in unfriendly lands, it is important to remember safe places to camp.
These pins will mark benches and other rest spots on your map.
Nuu takes time with her creatures, she must inspect closely. Thick arms, flakey hair, delicate eyes... Nuu will inspect it all!

Maiden, strong, wreathed in red,
Shield her shell, bless her thread!
She fights for us until the end,
Please protect my dearest friee-end!

If chance allows, visit the tower above. It is an impressive sight, not overgrown by the crust upon these caverns, but rather formed full of the material itself. If the old tribe of this place were able to guide its growth to such grand degree... then they possessed a power to rival even that Citadel.

These strange, shuffling pilgrims... In the camp below they were docile enough, but up here they seem to have lost their senses. They cry out to the darkness and attack their fellow travellers.Yakkanesh! Keep your weapon drawn and your bearings true! The way ahead is winding, and to lose one’s way invites only death.I am a navigator amongst my tribe and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
Ma, ma! Much hunting has you done, and so many sweet little creatures in our records!Nuu is drooling from such excess of learnings! Please keep working, miss grown-up!
In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.

O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!We meet again, little thief. Are you familiar with this place?If we ally our efforts, our escape could be made that much easier.Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! You can just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!

entry.name: GREENPRINCE_SIT_REPEAT
entry.hpage: Safe journey, tall bug.This is Pharloom, warrior. Safety is a myth.

entries.entry: Ventrica Pins

entry.name: SETH_FESTIVAL_MEET
entry.hpage: Greetings, Seth. It is a welcome surprise to see you here amongst these festivities.Hullo, hullo! Yes, my wandering was long, and I began to fear I would meet my end in those sticky swamps below.How lucky I was to stumble upon the home of these friendly revellers!They said I could be a flea here with them, so of course I agreed. Seems as good a place as any to call home, at least for a time.Now I just need to grow a little fur and sprout some wings, eh? Ha ha!

entries.entry: Swamps born in the Citadel’s shadow. There is evidence the waters here once ran clear.
Tangled roads choked beneath bramble and root. The flora is often as deadly as the creatures who call this place home.
What say you, nimble bug? The test of endurance remains at your ready! Let us stride fast forth!
Zaza and I will fight through these cursed lands until every last one of the black-twisted fiends has been cut down!

entry.name: SNAILS_ACT3_HORNET_RITUAL_CURSED_REPEAT
entry.page: Hurry, Old One. The ritual can’t commence while you remain host to that writhing root.Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.

entries.entry: The red-shells, hiding through the fields, stalking the boney beasts. They are part of it, somehow, the life that flourishes here.Even haunted, they seem to lose less of themselves... What anchor allows them to retain such strength?
Oh, but of course I sing! I am Sherma, a pilgrim just like you. I hear the call of the great Citadel just like every other devout soul.
Hoy! Hoyyyy! You there! Get us out of here! Since when’s a little light thievery worth a lifelong sentence?

Our great Citadel has lost its voice, and now the black threads rise up to tear its shell apart. I fear holy Pharloom is truly dying...But I still have hope, red maiden! Though kingdoms may fall, life endures still, and we bugs can build our lands anew!I share your hope, Sherma. Remember though that whatever is built next belongs not to the past, but to you.Your instincts are strong. Let it be those that guide you, rather than any reverence toward a kingdom’s corpse.Oho, you flatter me so! But it is my fellows who shall guide me, those whose voices sing out still, even in these ruined times...
Hahhh... well met, sister. The task of hunting down these black-twisted fiends is no small one, eh? Still, we must not rest! Not while the cries of the innocent echo from every corner of the kingdom!
Sign yourself as a snitch! And scoop up more rosaries from your bested foes. Just watch it when you’re snitchin’ that you don’t lose sum’a your own...

What’s this? The spider arrives at last, here to stand acquiver at our startling Citadel.Pale child, you return only to mock? Your lands have yet to prove my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
Is hard work, learning so much from creatures, but for Nuu is very fulfilling. Now go and hunt, and prey, miss grown-up!

Hoy there, fancy bug! How you farin’, now that the ‘ole world’s creakin’ and crackin’ around us? Desperately needin’ some supplies, I’ll wager! Heh heh!You seem in good spirits, thief. Are you not disturbed by the great rending of the kingdom?Heh, end of the world don’t bother ol’ Grindle none. We’ll just go find another one to plunder, won’t we?

entry.name: SNAILS_ACT3_HORNET_MEMORY_REOFFER
entry.page: Our spells’re woven, our parts prepared. Whenever you’re ready, lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.Best you don’t dawdle now. Pharloom’s time is short, and those hearts won’t go on beating forever.

entries.entry: No more talk, warrior. Permit me this final moment of memorial.As you wish, sir. I shall disturb you no longer.

entry.name: SPRINTMASTER_DECLINE
entry.hpage: Another time perhaps, sir. My own tasks cannot be easily ignored.Then I shall continue to train in anticipation of that future moment!Having met, it is inevitable. Fate calls us to compete!

entries.entry: Oh, welcome miss grown-up! Come to inspect the red-rocky creatures, like Nuu? We have found a very big one. Fresh, but not too fresh!A pair of beasts attacked me here, burrowing through the stone with their spiral shells. I cut this one down, and the other fled.Ooooh ma! Really? Nuu wishes that she had the pair! She could have studied much. Unlucky, to miss such a big feast of learnings!
We must press on... There is so much more... for us to do...
I see much wasted effort in these docks. There is too much flourish to the form of it all. The ways of others are strange indeed...

Nimble bug! We both know our previous run was only warm-up, yes? Only a tiny test to prepare for the real match, Hoi hoi!Well that match is now! A new track worthy of your skill, and mine. No longer merely a test!Meet the challenge and my speed full. Let us break through our limits and see what waits beyond!

You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.
With these I often mark the locations of worthy foes.

Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!I was intrigued by the challenge you issued on the bell settlement’s wishwall, sir, though having reached this place I wonder at your choice of location.If you seek challengers you should choose somewhere less far afield. It is rare chance any bug would journey to a cavern so distant.True, perhaps. Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
Uahhhhh... So close... Nuu could almost taste it.

Ho! Are you observing them too, hunter? The red-shells are plentiful here, stalking these vast grassy plains and the last of its bony beasts.Compared to the caves below, this lush growth feels even greater. Have we crawled close to the source of their sustenance?I must discover its secret! I will! By my father’s wish, and for hope that our dying lands might find means to endure.Just be careful, young one. I urge you. Here you’ve reached the ants’ heart-domain.There may be discoveries worth making, but a single mistake will see your shell’s sharp end.

Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, opened the way forward for us!What luck for us to meet at this moment! We can set off on the great road together!Or p’raps I’ll tarry here just a little longer. I want to sing a song of gratitude to this noble gate!
In these lands names are given freely, are they not? I am Shakra, Wielding Rings. If our hunts intertwine again, I will have new maps to trade.Until then, farewell, Child Wielding Needle.

This place is holy, yes... but I worry at the suffering of our fellow pilgrims. So many are hurt or exhausted!Your doubts and worries will not heal them, little one.If you would aid your fellows, you can start by dressing their wounds. The simple rags found around the settlement will do for bandages.Oh, that’s an excellent idea, red maiden! Normally I’d think a song would suffice, but... yes, more direct action is certainly needed.And the Citadel itself shall provide the materials! Praise be to this holiest of holy places!
Fear not, brothers and sisters! If we work hard and keep our faith, the Citadel will provide for us... I have no doubt!

entry.name: SNAILS_ACT3_DEEP_MEMORY3
entry.page: The hearts you seek, we can share their locations as best we know.Three will be needed to construct our spell and draw clear memory of the flower from your Silk.Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.

entries.entry: Ring Marker

This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? It is a difficult thing to explain simply... A test was needed, to ensure my strength before a greater challenge soon to come.Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
Burrowed paths of the red-shells. Their stores and shrines are frequent throughout. These tunnels must grant them swift passage about the fields below.

entry.name: LACE_ABYSS_LAKE_DIVE_CURSED_REPEAT
entry.hpage: If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.

entries.entry: So I am freed, despite no request of mine for aid.And I do not ask gratitude. The key merely fit the lock. If you choose, stay in here and wait till your shell hardens to crust.No. I shall depart shortly. With my way clear, my wish again propels me, though I tried to avoid it.Then safe journey, tall bug. I’ll not pry further. Clearly you bear your own burden.
Mm, mrm? Oh, hoy again!I hadn’t meant to drop off like that. It’s hard to stay awake in such a cosy place, isn’t it?

Oh hear me pray, please hear me sing,
My path’s ahead, but here’s the thing,
I can’t squeeze past, o gate of bone,
So please wake up, and help...oh?

entry.name: SNAILS_ACT3_HEART_HINT_CORAL
entry.page: Up top of those caves lost to wind and sand rests a crusted old ruler, a once great warrior king.In their prime, they and their order held half of Pharloom under hardened claw. Some bugs relished that strength. Most lived in fear of it.

entries.entry: Oooh ma! Sweet surprise for Nuu! You are adult, yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt?Certainly I am no child, young one.Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!Would you help Nuu? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?

Guurroooo! Scoundrel! Fiend! Who dares wake brave Garmond from his well needed kip?I’ve no intent to disturb, sir bug. I am merely passing these towers and sought to better understand the lay of the place.Hmmph! Knowing the battlefield? A warrior’s reason! Just look at you! Your stance and blade, almost alone they declare a fight.As the bravest of knights, if direct challenge were offered, honour would see noble Garmond accept!Fortunate that seems not your intent. In truth, I’m still sleeping off something of an altercation myself. Had our meeting called for a knightly duel, you’d not have had the luck to behold my finest form.

Hoy then, what’s a fancy-prancy bug like you creepin’ into Grindle’s cosy little nook for?Heard we had some nice stuff, did ya? O-hoho! All kinds of tasty goodies find their way here, that’s for sure.I care little for how you procured your goods, thief. If you have something worth trading, I may part with my rosaries.Well, we never say no to a fair swap, heh heh! Now take a look at what we’s got...
Now I shall remain, and train. And know! Though I have no more rewards to give, you are welcome to grace my track, as many times as you wish.
The sharp-faced bugs of these drizzled caves love to swoop and play, don’t they? If only I could understand their beautiful language...

...At the bottom of a well, you can only look up. The past is hidden from those who look forward......Those echoes may guide you still. Yes, that’s true. For the kind-hearted, a weapon can also be a friend......You’re so eager to follow in her footsteps. But what are you leaving for those who come next?
Bilewater Map
Hoof... Always you impress... nimble bug...As many times as you may, let us speed forth! Gladly will I strive to match your spritely grace.

This poor traveller finds her resolve waning. When I first greeted her, her voice was so hoarse I scarcely heard it!’Tis no cause for worry, though. My song will lift her from her torpor! Join your voice with mine, red maiden, and together we shall rouse our fellow pilgrim!
In time, even these great steps will be swept away by the sands. Nothing is immovable.

Ooh ma ma! Look here, miss grown-up! Very fascinating creature here, all dead in bits now, but still good!She takes the shape of the woods for her body, and her hair like bitter leaves! Clever, thinks Nuu!This creature staked its territory here and attacked as I passed through.You should not linger long. Her tribe remains hidden amongst the branches, disguised and waiting to strike.Oooh! So the cutting-up was done by you? Nuu gives her warm thanks! Now Nuu can inspect this creature well, all its gooey insides and crunchy shell!
